title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing 'Ok' after setting the output location, the following error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are currently two separate operations, and when the output location is set first, an illegal state is created.
SR:
1. Open the project settings
2. Navigate to the 'Output Location' section
3. Set a valid output location
4. Set the classpath
5. Press 'Ok' to save the changes
